forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 98, with temperatures falling to around 96 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 102. West southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 76. Heat index values as high as 100. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. North northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 9pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 9pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 4am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 64 overnight. West wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
